signUpDescription: Create your account by filling up the form
invalidEmail: The email entered is incorrect. Try again
passwordMinLength: The password must be at least 6 characters or more
name: Name
forgotPassDescription: Enter your email here to reset your password
loginError: There was an error in login
emailSentError: There was an error sending email
auth/email-already-in-use: There is already an account with that email
auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: Email is already associated with other account
auth/credential-already-in-use: There is already an account for that credential
auth/invalid-password: Password is not valid, must have at least 6 characters
auth/invalid-photo-url: The user photo URL is not valid
auth/uid-alread-exists: The given ID is already in use
auth/email-already-exists: The given email is already in use
auth/insufficient-permission: The credential used does not have access to the requested resource
auth/internal-error: Authentication server found an unexpected error
